task.title: Recommendations
task.shortdesc: Here are a few suggestions for making the WebHelp even better than it is now! now.

ul.li: Navigation Bar There are many different ways to have a navigation bar bring you to the different pages of your website. While there isn't anything wrong with simply listing the topics horizontally, it is not the most aesthetically pleasing because of the number of topics. A more user-friendly navigation bar could

Justify your color scheme- Why did you choose red and black with blue text? There is nothing wrong with it, but there doesn't seem to be a reason why you chose these colors. This scheme does not work into the theme of the site.

Fix the layout of the "Benefits of Internships" page- The layout here does not look good. The text is to the left of the picture and it appears that you probably intended for it to be above, like a subheading. Fixing this will make the page look much better.

Get a better title- I think making the site titled simply "Internships" isn't your best option. If this was a real resource for students to go to to learn about this subject, what would you name it? Try a more detailed and less general title.

context.p: This is a good site, but if you take these recommendations into consideration, it could go from good to great!
